meanings.definition: A diving bird of the family Podicipedidae, typically with a slender neck and pointed bill.
meanings.sent1: The grebe gracefully swam underwater to catch fish.
meanings.sent2: I saw a beautiful grebe diving into the lake for food.
meanings.sent3: The grebe's diving skills put the fish to shame!
meanings.sent4: Like a skilled grebe, she dove into her work with precision.
meanings.sent5: The grebe's slender neck and pointed bill make it an expert diver.

meanings.sent1: He decided to grebe into the pool to cool off.
meanings.sent2: The kids love to grebe into the ocean waves during summer.
meanings.sent3: She grebes into the pool like a champion diver!
meanings.sent4: The daredevil grebes off the cliff into the deep water below.
meanings.sent5: With a splash, he grebes into the refreshing water on a hot day.
